name.ja: <ruby>ＴＧ<rt>テックジーナス</rt></ruby> グレイブ・ブラスター

text.en:
1 Tuner Synchro Monster + 2+ non-Tuner Synchro Monsters
Must be Synchro Summoned. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 monster on the field Special Summoned from the Extra Deck; banish it. This effect can be used a number of times per turn up to the number of non-Tuner Synchro Monsters used as Synchro Material for this card. Once per turn, if a monster(s) is banished face-up: You can target 1 of them; Special Summon it to your field, ignoring its Summoning conditions.

materials: 1 Tuner Synchro Monster + 2+ non-Tuner Synchro Monsters
